page.shortlink: form layout control container container item name property
page.description: Assigns an item to the container. This property can be used to add event handling to the container.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Container item name]* can be used to add an item to the container that can be used to handle events - such as when the container is clicked or tapped.

section.description: Items are defined on the Items tab in the Form View Builder to handle events. For example, for a map control added to the FormView layout, an item could be added that displayed the latitude and longitude when the container is clicked.
